LanguageData.VoidAwakeningShamblerArrivalText: A horde of feral ghouls have been attracted by the void structures. Get ready!
LanguageData.LetterShamblerSwarmArrived:
A group of {0} feral ghouls are approaching. Radiation has mutated their bodies and set them to murder.

They will now wander through the area. If they see a human, they will attack. If not, they will leave in a few days.

If you can capture one, you can study it for anomaly knowledge.
LanguageData.LetterShamblerArrived:
A feral ghouls is approaching. Radiation has mutated its body and set them to murder.

It will now wander through the area. If it sees a human, it will attack. If not, it will leave in a few days.

If you can capture it, you can study it for anomaly knowledge.

A group of ghoulified {ANIMALKIND_label} are approaching. Radiation has mutated their bodies and set them to murder.

They will now wander through the area. If they see a human, they will attack. If not, they will leave in a few days.

If you can capture one, you can study it for anomaly knowledge.
